SEARCH
Package app

Class App

java.lang.Object
app.App
public class App extends Object
Main class to run and manage the game application. It handles game modes, player interactions, and the game loop.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    App()
    Default constructor for initializing the application.

    • hostGame

      public static void hostGame(Scanner sc)
      Method to create the game server, it will run joinGame with localhost as address after setting up the server

    • joinGame

      public static void joinGame(Scanner sc, String name, String ipAddress)
      Method for host to join the game server
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner to read inputs from the terminal
      name - The username of the host for creating a client to connect
      ipAddress - The ip address of the game server
